scripts.precommit: npm run docs; npm run create-index; npm run updateCount; git add documentation module/index.js README.md
scripts.docs: babel-node ./utils/createDocs.js; npm run toc; npm run updateCount
scripts.coverage: npm run compile; npm run istanbul; npm run clean
scripts.coveralls: npm run compile && npm run istanbul  && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && npm run clean
scripts.prepublish: npm test; npm run create-index; npm run compile
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
